[{"id":"131","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"CHAMPA ISLAND NHA TRANG RESORT HOTEL & SPA","tenbaiviet_en":"","tenbaiviet_cn":null,"tenbaiviet_jp":null,"mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":null,"mota_jp":null,"noidung_vi":"<p>T\u1ed4NG QUAN<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong>Champa Island Nha Trang Resort Hotel &amp; Spa<\/strong>&nbsp;to\u0323a la\u0323c tr&ecirc;n hai ho\u0300n \u0111a\u0309o ngay c\u01b0\u0309a s&ocirc;ng Ca\u0301i va\u0300 khu di ti\u0301ch Tha\u0301p Ba\u0300 Ponagar. Resort c&aacute;ch s&acirc;n bay Cam Ranh kho\u1ea3ng 39,2km, c&aacute;ch ga Nha Trang 2,4km v&agrave; c&aacute;ch trung t&acirc;m th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 Nha Trang kho\u1ea3ng 3,6km.<br \/>\r\nKhu ngh\u1ec9 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c chia th&agrave;nh 02 khu: Khu kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n Cham Island (cao 4 t\u1ea7ng) v&agrave; Khu c\u0103n h\u1ed9 du l\u1ecbch (cao 6 t\u1ea7ng) &amp; Bi\u1ec7t th\u1ef1 Cham Oasis. Khu ngh\u1ec9 c&oacute; 168 ph&ograve;ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ed1 tr&iacute; \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 trang thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Resort do C&ocirc;ng Ty C\u1ed5 ph\u1ea7n \u0110\u1ea7u T\u01b0 Th\u1ee7 Thi&ecirc;m l&agrave;m ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 v&agrave; do C&ocirc;ng ty C\u1ed5 ph\u1ea7n H\u1ea3i \u0110\u1ea3o l&agrave;m \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb qu\u1ea3n l&yacute;, ch&iacute;nh th\u1ee9c khai tr\u01b0\u01a1ng v&agrave; \u0111&oacute;n kh&aacute;ch t\u1eeb th&aacute;ng 7 n\u0103m 2015.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"500\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/3(7).jpg\" width=\"800\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_en":"","noidung_cn":null,"noidung_jp":null,"tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":null,"tags_jp":null,"seo_name":"champa-island-nha-trang-resort-hotel-spa","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"3","icon":"1691573008_5.jpg","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"dowload_text":"","duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1691573008","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"32","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"CHAMPA ISLAND NHA TRANG RESORT HOTEL & SPA","seo_title_en":"","seo_title_cn":null,"seo_title_jp":null,"seo_keywords_vi":"CHAMPA ISLAND NHA TRANG RESORT HOTEL & SPA","seo_keywords_en":"","seo_keywords_cn":null,"seo_keywords_jp":null,"seo_description_vi":"CHAMPA ISLAND NHA TRANG RESORT HOTEL & SPA","seo_description_en":"","seo_description_cn":null,"seo_description_jp":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","opt3":"0","opt4":"0","opt5":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_1_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_1_jp":null,"thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_2_jp":null,"thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_3_jp":null,"google_map":"","is_dongdau":"0","time_dongdau":"0"}]
